name: Santa Claus Is Comin’ To Town
lyric:
It's all cold down on the beach
The wind's whipping down the boardwalk
Hey Band! You guys know what time of year it is?
What time, what? What?
Christmastime!
What? Oh, Christmastime!
You guys, all, you guys all been good and practicing real hard?
Yeah?
Clarence, you been, you been rehearsing real hard now?
So Santa'll bring you a new saxophone, right?
Everyone out there been good or what?
Aw, that's not many, not many, you guys are in trouble out here

[Chorus 1]
Yeah, you'd better watch out, you'd better not cry
You'd better not pout, I'm telling you why
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town

[Chorus 2]
He's making a list, he's checking it twice
He's gonna find out who's naughty or nice
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
See Bruce Springsteen Live
Get tickets as low as $98
You might also like
O Holy Night
Christmas Songs
Used
SZA
Low
SZA
[Verse 1]
He sees you when you're sleeping
He knows when you're awake
He knows if you've been bad or good
You better be good for goodness sake!
You better be good for goodness sake!

[Chorus 1]
Oh, you'd better watch out, you'd better not cry
You'd better not pout, I'm telling you why
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Ho, ho, ho, ho!

[Saxophone Solo]

[Verse 2]
He sees you when you're sleeping
He knows when you're awake
He knows if you've been bad or good
You better be good for goodness sake!
You better be good for goodness sake!

[Chorus]
You'd better watch out, you'd better not cry
You'd better not pout, I'm telling you why
Santa Claus is coming to town, yeah
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
[Outro]
Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho, ho
Santa Claus is coming to town
Oh!
Santa Claus is coming to town
Yeah!
Santa Claus is coming to town
Yeah!
Santa Claus is coming to town
Whoa-oh-oh!
Santa Claus is coming to town
